Points: Math method applied to point calculation. (For exact point value, round up method might be used when necessary.)

Points: You must have at least %s point(s) to apply points.
Punkte: Sie müssen mindestens %s (n) haben, um Punkte zu bekommen.

Points: Order status database field used when checking points validity (modify this only if you know what you are doing).
